label: ham
subject: relevancy of saens as a member of ftp.us.d.o ?
body: 74 (return) [ Cod. Theodos. l. xii. tit. i. leg. 63. Godefroy (tom. iv. p. 409-413) performs the duty of a commentator and advocate. Tillemont (MŽm. Eccles. tom. viii. p. 808) _supposes_ a second law to excuse his orthodox friends, who had misrepresented the edict of Valens, and suppressed the liberty of choice.]
